brandAssetKit.title: Brand Asset Kit
brandAssetKit.description: The Astar Brand Asset Kit serves as the definitive reference point for community members and ecosystem projects. Dive into this brand guide to discover the exciting possibilities and guidelines for leveraging Astar's branding elements.

logo.title: Our logo
logo.description: You can’t edit, change, distort, recolor, or reconfigure the Astar logo. And, of course, don’t use our Logo to refer to any product or service that’s not Astar.

colors.title: Colours
colors.description: The Astar brand should always be expressed by using this colour palette exclusively. Please do not use any other/unauthorized colours.

typography.title: Typography
typography.description: Astar has strategically selected and implemented the typefaces to effectively communicate our values and establish a memorable brand presence.

cta.title: Download Astar Brand Assets
cta.description: The ZIP file and Figma file contain Astar and Astar zkEVM identities.

brandAssetKit.note: If you employ the mark or any variation of it in association with illegal or deceitful activities, we reserve the right to withdraw this trademark license. In such a scenario, you must immediately discontinue all usage of the mark and its variations.
